channel.title: How do i change starters?
channel.description: how do i change starters? jw. someone please help.

item.title: How do i change starters?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Menno582, post:1, topic:274899”][quote author=Kihomura link=topic=363189.msg2758936#msg2758936 date=1240408777]
If you receive your starting equipment on login, it’s in your initialize method. If you’re wearing your equipment, it’s in the player class. If you receive it from a command, it’s in your customCommand method or in any other class used for commands.
[/quote]

Yeah, clear up:
Search ‘‘Starter’’ in client.java
till you see something like

Starter ==0

Then below that you see all items ID’s/amount

Just change that =o[/quote]
You are so funny.

As Kihomura stated, it’s in your initialize method located within your client class.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change starters?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“Menno582, post:1, topic:274899”]Yeah, clear up:
Search ‘‘Starter’’ in client.java
till you see something like

Starter ==0

Then below that you see all items ID’s/amount

Just change that =o[/quote]

You’re an idiot.

item.title: How do i change starters?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

If you receive your starting equipment on login, it’s in your initialize method. If you’re wearing your equipment, it’s in the player class. If you receive it from a command, it’s in your customCommand method or in any other class used for commands.

Read full topic
